page.title: 07HOME LIFE- ADULT-KINGSBARNS
page.content: {MORNING} - ON SATURDAY, I AROSE AT O7.3O., WENT TO BATHROOM, WASHED, CLEANED TEETH, AND THEN DRESSED. I WENT DOWNSTAIRS AND PREPARED BREAKFAST FOR THE FAMILY. I THEN DID THE DISHES, MADE THE BEDS , AND HOOVERED. AFTER WHICH I WENT TO THE VILAGE SHOP. {AFTERNOON} - I MADE DINNER, AT 12.OO., FOR THE FAMILY AND THEN WASHED UP. AT 14.OO HRS., WE ALL WENT TO ST. ANDREWS FOR SHOPPING. WE RETURNED AT 17.OO HRS., HAD TEA AND TIDIED UP. {EVENING} - WE ALL WATCHED T.V. FOR ABOUT TWO HOURS. MY HUSBAND AND I CHANGED AND WENT TO THE LOCAL "CAMBO ARMS HOTEL", WHERE WE SPENT A VERY PLEASANT EVENING. {NIGHT} - AFTER A LIGHT SUPPER WE WENT TO BED AND SLEPT SOUNDLY.
